about_the_game:
V16 engines are the largest capacity engine configuration available in Automation, with a capacity range of 1.1L - 21.7L. While it is not giving players any direct advantage, it offers a nuanced alternative to V12 engines for very-high-end cars.

Back before Steam Early Access was a thing, we did sell an early version of Automation via our own website. From 2012 to 2014, potential buyers had the choice between base version ($25), and a premium version ($35) of the game for players who wanted to support development a little extra. The latter promised the inclusion of exclusive V16 engines as soon as they are done. Now, after almost a year of V16 exclusivity for those early premium version buyers, we offer the upgrade to anyone who missed out back then and still wants to support us today.
detailed_description:
V16 engines are the largest capacity engine configuration available in Automation, with a capacity range of 1.1L - 21.7L. While it is not giving players any direct advantage, it offers a nuanced alternative to V12 engines for very-high-end cars.

Back before Steam Early Access was a thing, we did sell an early version of Automation via our own website. From 2012 to 2014, potential buyers had the choice between base version ($25), and a premium version ($35) of the game for players who wanted to support development a little extra. The latter promised the inclusion of exclusive V16 engines as soon as they are done. Now, after almost a year of V16 exclusivity for those early premium version buyers, we offer the upgrade to anyone who missed out back then and still wants to support us today.

fullgame.name: Automation - The Car Company Tycoon Game

name: Supporter Pack - V16 Engines

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support Shader Model 4.0 (Intel HD3000 Integrated, Geforce 8 Series, Radeon 2000 Series)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements for Ultra Low Settings. Framerate may be poor in some situations.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Recent Intel i5/i7 or AMD 6 core or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD 290x or nVidia 970GTX or Better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: System requirements for good frame rate Epic Settings. Solid State Drive highly recommended for best loading performance

short_description: This package supports development and as a “thank you” makes V16 engines available in Automation. V16s are the largest engine configuration in the game.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish
*languages with full audio support
